mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, activity_des, activity_img, activity_info_img, activity_content, activity_info_content, is_deleted
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, activity_des, activity_img, activity_info_img, activity_content, activity_info_content from activity where is_deleted = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into activity (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, activity_des, activity_img, activity_info_img, activity_content, activity_info_content, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmt_create,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmt_modified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activity_des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity_img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity_info_img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity_info_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT})
